law.catch_line: Restriction on award of contracts by construction manager.
law.text: When a construction manager is utilized in construction, maintenance, repairs, or renovation or expansion of school facilities the construction manager shall not award construction contracts to any company which the manager owns or in which the manager has a financial interest if less than two (2) bids are accepted.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 379, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
